page.title: 20EVENTS
page.content:
The village has several annual events, the main ones being,the school fete, organised by the Fund Raising Assoc. and the carnival organised by the carnival association.The school fete which is always well attended,involves gym and maypole displays by children, various stalls and fun events.The carnival procession has floats from local organisations,finishing with a fete and funfair.The BMX Club holds monthly races.The Football Club has an annual disco dinner and the Cricket Club,a barbecue.Tennis tournaments are regular events.A band concert held for the first time last year and financed by the parish council,featured the Boxted Methodist Silver Band.This year the Essex Police Band will be playing.
Domesday Survey compiled by children, staff and parents of Silver End School
